post.body: - just asking: WTF did Lori L ever do w/Northstars??
- CRAPP!!!! I totally forgot! I put the Wednesday one in my calendar and then didn't move it to Saturday and I SUUUUUUCKK!!
- baby not asleep - won't make it there in time. Will try Saturday. Have a good concert!
- no joke. It is COLD out there.
- Wait! we can be reasonable! What are your demands?
- We do not negotiate.
- wow. glad it's not you!
- holiday twitter-guilt! Aak!
Happy Birthdaying! Snow!
It seems to be unneccessarily-good-looking-salt-and-pepper-haired-man day on Lower Broadway if anyone's interested.
My daughter looks like Cindy Lou Who and acts like Stitch.
Being a-bit-more-than-annoyed at University bureaucracy that ruins my plans and delays my checks.
Cats sleeping. Sketches approved (!). Still out of diapers. Time to shower.
Surely there's a James Bond on tonight. I'd settle for an Ocean's Eleven or something similar...
Finally done with the paintings, need to scan and send. Whew. But not right now.
Reaping effects of warming-up caffeinated tea. Drat!
Done with more painting than I thought! Yay!
Over feeling buffeted about the head by various eras of my past.
running out of places to procrastinate on the interweb. drat.
Getting back in the swing of things.
Dreading O'Hare delays.
